input.sentences: [male] received an award from the military for his service to his country .
a photo was taken with his wife and military officers .
he was congratulated by an important person .
the audience gave [male] a standing ovation .
output.sentences: Mr. James was a civilian who worked for the military and received an award for his work.
His wife joined him in the congratulatory photo to remember the occasion.
His superior, Mr. Evans,  also congratulated him.
Then Mr. Evans thanked his wife for putting up with the long hours her husband worked.
At the end of the ceremony Mr. James friends and family gave him a standing ovation.
